answers.answer: Your blood sugar is good and there is no reason to suspect diabetes. Many things can lead to headaches and giddiness (dizziness??). If the symptoms persist and concern you, see your doctor.

question: I am working in call center, I am suffering sometiems from headache and guidiness since one month.I had a blood test done, blood sugar fasting, earlier a year ago it was 100 mg/dl, now it is 70 mg/dlplease suggest me what should I do have good health.Thank you.
title: diabetic test
